Sawt (Arabic) bụ ụdị egwu a ma ama na Kuwait na Bahrain

A na-ekwu na sawt guzobere na Kuwait site n'aka onye na-ede uri, onye na-ede egwú, onye na-agụ egwú na onye ọkpụkpọ oud Abdallah al-Faraj (1836-1901/1903). Onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Bahraini bụ Mubārak al-'Ammārī kwenyere na a maara sawt na Kuwait tupu 1766, na Bahrain kemgbe 1783. A na-ewere Saleh na Daoud Al-Kuwaity dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ mbụ ya.
Sawt bụ ụdị egwu dị mgbagwoju anya nke obodo ukwu, nke a na-eme na 'ud (lute) na mirwas (ụbọ), na violin mechara gbakwunye nhazi ahụ.
Ụmụ nwoke abụọ na-agba egwú a na-akpọ "Zaffan"
A na-eme Al-Sout naanị na nnọkọ abalị nke ụmụ nwoke
